caption.p: Size of the ligands affects the structure. Predicted model structures of Au 44(SR) 26 and Au 44(SR) 28 clusters for different ligands. Due to spatial fitting of the organic part of the ligand Au 44(SR) 28 is found only for ligand sizes <2.8 Å as mimicked by the spherical probe (see Supplementary Table 6). The maximum number of ligands with 3.0 Å probe on Au 44(SR) 28 surface is 26
